newsitem.title: UK: BFI rises four points to 1,113 in slow conditions.
newsitem.headline: BFI rises four points to 1,113 in slow conditions.

text.p: The Baltic Freight Index (BFI) rose four points to 1,113 on Wednesday in slow conditions, though brokers noted firmer fixtures were concluded in the Atlantic for capers and panamaxes.
Kleimar fixed the Pawnee for 120,000 long tons coal Hampton Roads to Rotterdam for September 5/20 for $5.62.
MSK fixed the Ocean Ruby for 52,000 long tons heavy grain U.S. Gulf/Japan for September 9/17 at $21.00 no combo.
